text: this is Akihabara in Tokyo and in this
neighborhood there are lots and lots of
shops that specialize in selling manga
so what is manga well it's a very
Japanese art form it's really graphic
novels or animated storybooks that are
directed not at children but at adults
and it is very very popular in Japan and
there are dozens and dozens of different
genres of manga and those include manga
pornography and child porn so I'm going
to go in here and see what I can find
inside here is a huge variety of manga
porn openly on display including stuff
like this now you can see from the
outside cover this is clearly a child
and I'm obviously not going to show you
what is inside it but I can tell you it
depicts multiple scenes of the child
character being raped material like this
would be illegal in many countries
including the United States and Britain
it's not illegal here and it's going to
remain legal despite this new
legislation as our video games and
cartoons also depicting this sort of
child pornography the argument made here
in Japan is that there are no victims
real human victims of this sort of
material and it is a matter of free
speech but it's also clearly about money
the manga industry in Japan is huge and
the publishers don't want any
restrictions on what they can publish
